quotes.quote: The torture of a bad conscience is the hell of a living soul.
There is no greater hell than to be a prisoner of fear.
Hell is the highest reward that the devil can offer you for being a servant of his.
We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell.
The road to hell is paved with adverbs.
Hell isn't merely paved with good intentions; it's walled and roofed with them. Yes, and furnished too.
Hell is oneself, hell is alone, the other figures in it merely projections. There is nothing to escape from and nothing to escape to. One is always alone.
Hell hath no limits, nor is circumscribed In one self place, for where we are is hell, And where hell is there must we ever be.
Hell is a place where you have nothing to do but amuse yourself.
What makes earth feel like hell is our expectation that it should feel like heaven.
Hell was made for the inquisitive.
Hell is not punishment, it's training.
Hell is empty and all the devils are here.
A man from hell is not afraid of hot ashes.
If you want to enter hell, don't complain of the dark; you can't blame the world for being unfair if you start on the path of the rebel.
Hell is a place, a time, a consciousness, in which there is no love.
Hell is paved with priests' skulls.
Hell is full of good wishes or desires.
Hell is truth seen too late.
Sometimes hell has no words.
Hell is just resistance to life.
Hell is paved with good samaritans.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Paradise was made for tender hearts; hell, for loveless hearts.
A perpetual holiday is a good working definition of hell.
